localised_text.tooltip_text: You haven't unlocked all Gifts in this set.
Sort Gifts by turn received||When disabled, Gifts are sorted by God-alignment.

wh3.name: wh3
wh3.tooltip: Filter gifts earned from the Daemonic Progression tree by Chaos God and/or the Undivided. Use multiple filters for greater control of your armoury and customisation selections.
